ygData.subject: Re: Hail
ygData.msgSnippet: But the 1 pp I would save in the trek for a FS sword I could make up (and then some) in the time it takes me to make the trek all the way to Cazik :)
ygData.messageBody:
But the 1 pp I would save in the trek for a FS sword I could
make up (and then some) in the time it takes me to make
the trek all the way to Cazik :)



> ----------
> From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 10:40 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Hail
>
> From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
> As a reminder, you can get FS weapons in cazic thule, they are better than
> regular weapons, and players will sell real cheap because any of the
> "good" races and the casters can't sell anywhere near by. FS sells for 4
> pp at stores, so you can offer that and have your choice of weapons.
>
> Salr D'Taynkk
> Dark Warrior of The Kith
> Veeshan
>
> >>> "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...> 5.24.99 9:38:39 AM >>>
> From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
>
> You can get bronze weapons from Gnoll Nobles and Dervishes,
> much better than the tarnished sword. You can also shell out
> about 5 pp for a regular sword. I paid 5pp for my Broadsword
> and it works much better than the rusty and tarnished versions
> (almost 1 more in damage and -2 in delay).
>
> Angarth, Warrior of the 15th Tier
> "Periissem ni periisem"
>
>
> > ----------
> > From: Patricia Halas[SMTP:patty_halas@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 5:34 AM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: [warriors_eq] Hail
> >
> > From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>
> >
> > Hail Warriors,
> >
> > I am a 6'6" Barbarian Warrior Princess of the 11th circle currently
> > wandering Clan Crushbone in an effort to rid the world of Orcs. I am
> > looking for better armor or weapons. I am wearing all leather (and I
> > feels
> > good) and using a tarnished longsword with a shield. Looking forward to
> > the
> > day I am weilding two longswords and I can kill orcs quicker.
> >
> > For the Honor and Glory of Rellos Zek;
> >
> > Patty of Halas
> > username: Patricia
> > server: Bristlebane
